member.name: M:BoldReports.Server.Service.ActionFilters.CustomAuthorizationAttribute.ForceValidateRequest(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Filters.AuthorizationFilterContext)
member.summary: Method to verify whether the request needs to force validate the token. This is added to ensure that the reports load action revalidated the token to avoid unauthorized access to the reports in mobile application
member.returns: Boolean that represents whether to validate the token or not
